verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> you have searched <S%H2713><s%> me, <S%H3045><s%> and you know me.
You know <S%H3045><s%> my sitting <S%H3427><s%> down and my rising <S%H6965><s%> up. <S%H995><s%> You perceive my thoughts <S%H7454><s%> from afar. <S%H7350><s%>
You search <S%H2219><s%> out my path <S%H734><s%> and my lying down, <S%H7252><s%> and are acquainted <S%H5532><s%> with all my ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For there is not a word <S%H4405><s%> on my tongue, <S%H3956><s%> but, <S%H3068><s%> behold, Yahweh, you know it altogether. <S%H3045><s%>
You hem <S%H6696><s%> me in behind <S%H268><s%> and before. <S%H6924><s%> You laid <S%H7896><s%> your hand on me. <S%H3709><s%>
This knowledge <S%H1847><s%> is beyond <S%H6383><s%> me. <S%H7682><s%> It's lofty. I can't <S%H3201><s%> attain it.
Where could I go <S%H3212><s%> from your Spirit? <S%H7307><s%> Or where could I flee <S%H1272><s%> from your presence? <S%H6440><s%>
If I ascend up <S%H5266><s%> into heaven, <S%H8064><s%> you are there. <S%H3331><s%> If I make my bed in Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> behold, you are there!
If I take <S%H5375><s%> the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the dawn, <S%H7837><s%> and settle <S%H7931><s%> in the uttermost parts <S%H319><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%>
Even there your hand <S%H3027><s%> will lead <S%H5148><s%> me, <S%H3225><s%> and your right hand will hold me. <S%H270><s%>
If I say, <S%H559><s%> "Surely the darkness <S%H2822><s%> will overwhelm <S%H7779><s%> me; <S%H216><s%> the light around me <S%H1157><s%> will be night; <S%H3915><s%>"

even the darkness <S%H2822><s%> doesn't <S%H2821><s%> hide from you, <S%H3915><s%> but the night shines <S%H215><s%> as the day. <S%H3117><s%> The darkness <S%H2825><s%> is like light to you. <S%H219><s%>
For you formed <S%H7069><s%> my inmost <S%H3629><s%> being. <S%H5526><s%> You knit me together in my mother <S%H517><s%>'s womb. <S%H990><s%>

I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H3372><s%> for I am fearfully and wonderfully made. <S%H6395><s%> Your works <S%H4639><s%> are wonderful. <S%H6381><s%> My soul <S%H5315><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> that very well. <S%H3966><s%>
My frame <S%H6108><s%> wasn't <S%H3582><s%> hidden from you, <S%H6213><s%> when I was made in secret, <S%H5643><s%> woven <S%H7551><s%> together in the depths <S%H8482><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> my body. <S%H1564><s%> In your book <S%H5612><s%> they were all written, <S%H3789><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that were ordained <S%H3335><s%> for me, <S%H259><s%> when as yet there were none of them.
How precious <S%H3365><s%> to me are your thoughts, <S%H7454><s%> God! <S%H410><s%> How vast <S%H6105><s%> is their sum! <S%H7218><s%>
If I would count <S%H5608><s%> them, <S%H7235><s%> they are more in number than the sand. <S%H2344><s%> When I wake <S%H6974><s%> up, <S%H5750><s%> I am still with you.
If only you, <S%H433><s%> God, would kill <S%H6991><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%> Get away <S%H5493><s%> from me, <S%H1818><s%> you bloodthirsty men! <S%H582><s%>
For they speak <S%H559><s%> against you wickedly. <S%H4209><s%> Your enemies <S%H6145><s%> take <S%H5375><s%> your name in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H8130><s%> I hate those who hate <S%H8130><s%> you? <S%H6962><s%> Am I not grieved with those who rise up against you? <S%H8618><s%>
I hate <S%H8130><s%> them with perfect <S%H8503><s%> hatred. <S%H8135><s%> They have become my enemies. <S%H341><s%>
Search <S%H2713><s%> me, <S%H410><s%> God, and know <S%H3045><s%> my heart. <S%H3824><s%> Try <S%H974><s%> me, <S%H3045><s%> and know my thoughts. <S%H8312><s%>
See <S%H7200><s%> if there is any wicked <S%H6090><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> in me, <S%H5148><s%> and lead me in the everlasting <S%H5769><s%> way. <S%H1870><s%>
